title: Free Agency Day 3 Winners & Losers: Where will Jameis Winston and Cam Newton land? (Football 3/19)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap Day 3 of Free Agency, which also marked the official start to the new league year. And that means more winners & losers! The guys discuss Tom Brady's ongoing process to get a deal signed with the Bucs, as well as the now limited options for quarterbacks like Jameis Winston and Cam Newton. Plus, what's the Patriots plan to handle their hole at QB? Nick Foles is now a Bear after a Wednesday trade, which wasn't received well by our resident Chicago fan, Sean. The Pick Six Superfriends chat more winners and losers including both L.A. teams before reading a 5-star review from Apple Podcasts.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
